origin.originregen.timelord.name: Timelord
origin.originregen.timelord.description: You are a Timelord, an alien race from the planet Gallifrey which can escape death via regeneration.
power.originregen.regeneration.name: Regeneration
power.originregen.regeneration.descripti: Your body has a way of cheating death by regenerating every cell in your body, but only a few times. On your last regeneration you will become a new origin.
